column2: definitely one of the best the best in town. The bark on their brisket is thick and the smoke ring is perfect. Everything is made from scratch
column4: and the flavor proves it. I've gone several times
column5: and they always have mac and cheese
column6: but the other sides seem to rotate
column8: because you can't go wrong with any of them. Last time I got two tacos
column9: one a pulled pork with an avocado cilantro cream sauce
column10: topped with cojita cheese and pickled onions. The other was a brisket taco
column11: and I wolfed that down before being able to pick out its ingredients. Get some sweet tea! Or some great local beer.
